As Primary Election Day approaches on March 17th, we wanted to make you aware of an issue on the ballot that has an effect on our District, the Joint Financing District levy renewal. The financing district is made up of Madison, Painesville City, Perry, and Riverside and currently costs residential taxpayers $69.74/year per $100,000 of valuation. This levy has been renewed every 5 years since 1990 and does NOT increase taxes.
